title: Quiet home in the hills against greenbelt - no rear neighbors
posting_body: This home is unfurnished, but is pictured here as furnished.
Described as a 4BR home in Solano County records, but one bedroom is actually a loft overlooking the living area.
To be clear, there are only 3 enclosed bedrooms plus an open loft with a door that can act as a 4th bedroom.
With a bit of creativity, the loft can be used as a bedroom.
Against the rolling Somerset Highlands hills with no rear neighbors for exceptional privacy.
Short of rural living, this is one of the quietest neighborhoods you will find in a city.
Hiking trails are just beyond the rear fence.
The home has carpeting throughout.
House interior has been freshly repainted.
Tenant pays all utilities except trash collection.
Basic lawn maintenance included.
Lease terms are 1-year.
Availability date could be somewhat later than posted here.
Applicants must be able to prove a credit score of 650 or above and an annual household income of at least $100K annually.
Please let us know if you qualify on income and credit score when requesting a tour.
This house has NOT been qualified under the government Section 8 housing program.
Note: Photos are not current.
Window treatments, kitchen floor, landscaping/backyard, and other items are different now.
No smoking
3-car garage plus 3-car off-street parking.
Showing is by appointment only.
Includes trash collection and basic lawn maintenance.
Tenant has the option to include a refrigerator and washer/dryer in the rental - or use their own.
Small dogs are ok.
